sentence.Network_en: The earth is a spheroid and not a sphere.

sentence.Network_en: Spheroid, all ball game ses, mostly round ball form!
sentence.Network_cn: 球形, 所有的球类运动, 大都是圆球形!

sentence.Network_en: Anyway, this book says the earth is more like an oblate spheroid.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管怎么说, 该书说地球更像一个扁球体.
